message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $110.  I think it's a great deal for you, as I know how valuable it is.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $110 is already a very competitive price for this item.  Could you meet me halfway at $100?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps meet at $97?
